Title: You Are the One
Writer: Raz de la Torre (story), Raz de la Torre (screenplay), Vanessa R. Valdez (screenplay), Carmi Raymundo (screenplay)
Actors: Toni Gonzaga, Sam Milby, Jodi Sta. Maria, Susan Africa
Plot: Sally Malasmas applies for a US visa. There she meets the young and dashing vice-consul Will Derby with a wide, warm and inviting smile. Sally feels it's her lucky day! But Will thinks ...
